subject: [video] HandShifter is not working
description_text:

conversations.body_text: Hi Pyeong Oh,  May I ask which platform you purchased from, and what is the order number? I will check it for you first.

I purchased at taobao app

Hi Pyeong Oh,  Please use Freejoy 1.7.0, connect your device, and click “Read Config from Device.” Then take screenshots of the Pin and Axis interfaces so I can check if the configuration is correct.        https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hnHNudj0VhE6xr7ypu-KeEDuVrlVHVg9/view?usp=drive_link

Hi Pyeong Oh,     Please download the configuration file from the attachment first. Then follow the steps shown in the screenshot: 1, 2, and 3 to restore the settings, and click 4 to calibrate. After that, the device will be ready to use. Important: Every time you open the software, please click Step 1 first. Otherwise, after modifying the configuration, the built-in incorrect settings may overwrite the correct ones, causing the device to malfunction.

but, unfortunately not work for me..

I thins calibrate is not applied correct value

I solved the problem
But I don't know why It works

your hand brake has four spot for nut for mount on plate
my plate has not enough hole to nut
so I tied left top hole and using bolt on the left bottom positon
others is empty. and It is stable on mount plate
but if use bolt provided from you. It not works.
I realized that when unmount my handbrake.
so I change the other bolt from other product's remain pieces.
then It worked

I want to know why this happened.
at now It work so~.. It's time to go racing

thx for you help
